item.title: DevOps Gathering - Container Workshops
item.description:
Docker Workshops in Bochum - 2017/3/23

Dear DevOps Friends!

One week after the Docker Birthday Week, we invite you to continue the celebrations with us. Within our DevOps Gathering Conference 2017, we bring together Container experts, beginners and interesting individuals. During interesting half-day workshops you will have the chance to practice DevOps tools to improve your knowledge and become an expert.

Docker on ARM & Orchestration

Speaker: Dieter Reuter* and Peter Rossbach

  • Check your docker tools for ARM
  • Build Docker Images on ARM
  • Setup an IoT Project on ARM
  • Learn Swarming Mode Basics
  • Setup a Swarm Cluster
  • Prepare your Images
  • Rolling your services forward
  • Network, Port Publishing and Loadbalancing
  • Service Discovery
  • Orchestration

Docker for Windows

Speaker: Dieter Reuter* and Stefan Scherer*

  • Setup Windows Docker Container at Windows Server 2016
  • Size your images
  • Package windows service into a container
  • Hack Around with windows container
  • Review at a real example

Docker for Java Developers

Speaker: Roland Huss

  • Create your java images with Maven
  • Use an IDE with docker
  • Setup integration test
  • Optimize your java base images
  • How you can run your container with resource constraints?

Prepare your docker images with Gitlab/CI

Speaker: Niclas Mietz

  • Setup your own GitLab/CI for your team
  • Create your own docker images producing pipeline
  • Test and validate your containers
  • Create and use runners
  • Build good docker images

“Bootiful” Containers with Spring-Boot and Docker

Speaker: Kevin Wittek

  • Run Spring-Boot Apps inside a Docker container
  • Build your Spring-Boot Docker image using Gradle
  • Make Spring-Boot Apps configurable with Environment-Variables
  • Unit- and Integration-Test your Spring-Boot App with Spock and Docker
  • Deploy and configure Spring-Boot microservices using docker-compose

*Docker Captain

Register and get one of our limited tickets, now!

item.title: DevOps Gathering 2017
item.description:
Call for Papers

Dear DevOps Friends and Speakers!

We are in the preparation of the first edition of DevOps Gathering Conference in March 2017. One week after the Docker Birthday, we invite you to continue the celebrations with us.

Everyone is invited to join discuss the hottest topics of the DevOps development with its impact on the digital transformation. Join our journey and cooperate on infrastructure technology and innovative solutions to revolutionize the software industry.

We are looking forward to proposals with practical relevance – ideally based on project experiences or real technical inspiration.

As usual, we would like to invite you to submit your proposals for sessions in March. We will focus on the following topics, but are always open for surprises with new inspiring talks:

  • Docker Orchestration
  • Docker Security
  • Docker Networking
  • Docker for Microservices
  • Docker on Windows
  • Docker on ARM
  • Docker for Java or Go Developer
  • Stateful Container
  • Provisioning
  • Continuous Integration and Delivery
  • Cloud
  • Logging & Monitoring
  • Container Technologies
  • Microservice based Front-End Development

Date: 24 – 25 March, 2017

Location: G Data Campus Bochum

Deadline for submissions: January 23, 2017

You can offer us 30 minutes talks or 10 minutes lightning stories or tech speeches.

At 25.3 we plan a Docker expert OpenSpace and you can discuss the hottest Docker container or ecosystem topics.

Submit your papers here: call4papers@bee42.com

We are looking forward to your comprehensive feedback as well as your questions, suggestions and discussions.

We wish you a peaceful winter!

The bee42 Conference Crew
